item.title: Sequential Turn Signal mod for NG Scania v5.0.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 1, 2025

Sequential Turn Signal mod for NG Scania v5.0.1 ETS2

Animated turn signals for Scania 2016

The animation works from the front and back
Improved daylight
Added colored running lights

Compatible with Scania R/S 2016 from SCS
Update for patch 1.56

Credits: Shelphy

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Bright Headlights 1.56 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 1, 2025

Bright Headlights 1.56 ATS

ATTENTION! I made mod for myself and maybe you do not need it.

American Truck Simulator
mod: -=( ATS Bright Headlights v.1.56 .scs

This mod changes light the headlights in trucks SCS ATS and light the headlights reverse

List of trucks (SCS) in ATS by default:
– freightliner.cascadia2019
– freightliner.cascadia2024
– intnational.9900i
– intnational.lonestar
– intnational.lt
– kenworth.t680
– kenworth.t680_2022
– kenworth.w900
– mack.anthem
– mack.pinnacle
– peterbilt.389
– peterbilt.579
– volvo.vnl
– volvo.vnl2018
– westernstar.49x
– westernstar.5700xe
– westernstar.57x

Credits: bobo58

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. item.title: Shacman x6000 – 1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 1, 2025

Shacman x6000 – 1.56 ETS2

Update for 1.56. Added a couple of lightbars to the roof.

Added a couple of kangaroos
I added a couple of flashing lights
Added a few light bulbs. Added a vinyl skirt.
Another interior has been added
Added Cummins and Caterpillar engines Registeredinagencyorders

Credits: AJIEHA

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

item.title: The Godfathers FTE Reefer Trailer Skins Pack v1.1 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 1, 2025

The Godfathers FTE Reefer Trailer Skins Pack v1.1 ATS

The Godfather’s Mods Company Brings to you the Ultimate FTE Reefer Trailer Skins pack that is jam pack full of skins of Real Life Australian and New Zealand Companies with some of the companies no longer with us in real life and are all owned by The Godfather’s Mods Company EST 2021
This Trailer is a old trailer skins and u must have the 4 pack installed for the Trailer to show the B Double and Road Train Trailers as well folks…

Make Shore to Download The Godfather’s FTE Mega Pack v1.0 at Modhub.us or other ATS Sites that have my Mods the get the Updated Working FTE Reefer Trailer and Australian Flare Lights for the lights to work on the Trailer and for the skins to work on the Trailer..
Do not add the FTE Skins pack v1.0 of mine as there is a updated edition witch is this mod..

v1.0 (Launch Edition) August 2025
The Launch edition of The Godfather’s FTE Trailer Skins Pack brings 50 skins of Real Life Companies and Brands from Australia and New Zealand.

v1.1 (Updated October 1st 2025)
This Update Brings 30 new Skins of Real Companies and Brands and brings the pack up to a total of 80 Skins.

The Skins that are in this FTE Trailer Skins Pack are Listed belowa and also shows what country its from..
– AJM Transport (Australia)
– Aldi Supermarkets (Australia)
– Aryzta Australia (Switzerland Company was born and is in Australia)
– Australian Native Landscapes (Australia)

The Godfather’s Mods Company holds all rights to the skins in this pack and will update the pack with new skins in the next update witch will be v1.1 and skins will be Previewed on The Godfather’s Gameplay at his You Tube channel Australia Worldiwde Entertainment.
